name: loop
snippet:
<fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList">
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>${{itemName}}s</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[ValueCount ( ${{itemName}}s )]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>${{itemName}}Count</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[""]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>${{inc}}</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="71" name="Loop"></Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="72" name="Exit Loop If">
		<Calculation><![CDATA[Let ( ${{inc}} = ${{inc}} + 1 ; If ( ${{inc}} > Int ( ${{itemName}}Count ) ; Let ( ${{inc}} = "" ; True ) ) )]]></Calculation>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable">
		<Value>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[GetValue ( ${{itemName}}s ; ${{inc}} )]]></Calculation>
		</Value>
		<Repetition>
			<Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation>
		</Repetition>
		<Name>$current{{itemName}}</Name>
	</Step>
	<Step enable="True" id="73" name="End Loop"></Step>
</fmxmlsnippet>
